Now your team does not have to worry about Vulnerabilities and threats. iValid8 is a Vulnerability Tracker & Advisory which comes in the form of Newsletter released in every 15 days. This not just any vulnerability newsletter, it is a customized vulnerability advisory. Now you can check all your hardware and software assets and stay updated regarding all the vulnerabilities released w.r.t your specific IT Assets (Hardware, Software/Applications). Key Features iValid8 monitors the vulnerabilities specific to your IT Infrastructure and IT Assets and our team will form a report with Vulnerability advisory. This will help you to keep your systems updated and free from Vulnerabilities every 15 days. Now your team does not have to worry about Vulnerabilities and threats that arise day to day.
